content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were riding on our harley making our way back home from moncton,when i noticed ,what i thought at first was a plane in the sky above us but to the right of us.It stayed with us as we drove ,it almost looked like it was hovering,but it stayed in the same spot in the sky as we kept driving.So,i pointed it out to my husband and he gave me a thumbs up.I watched it,and realized that it didn't have a tail section,or wings for that matter and it was orange in color.So,i thought it might be because it was banking or was in a position in the sky where i couldn't see the wings,but where was the tail? so i thought it was orange because it was nearing sunset and the sun was bright orange,so i looked to my left to see if the sun was above the tree line( which would explain why the object was orange) or below the tree line,then i looked to my right and the object had vanished.I scanned the sky around us and it was gone.There were no clouds in the sky at that moment and it just disappeared.The sun was above the tree line,we were on the highway.It took maybe 4 or 5 seconds when i looked away from the object on my right side ,to look on my left side to see if the sun was above the tree line or not,and then look back to the right to look at the object again,but it had vanished.This was only the 4th daytime sighting i have had,but have had many nightime sightings over the years since 1991.I have reported every sighting to hbcc,but now they don't operate anymore and this is why i am using mufon.Since that sighting ,my husband and i have had several sightings.We feel fortunate for all the "shows".
content.summary: My husband and i were riding the harley,when a cylinder appeared above to the right of us

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting on our back pation facing due east looking at the very bright moon around 7:45pm to 8:35pm on sept 23, 2010. there was intermittent cloud cover but during the sighting it was a clear sky.
we noticed around 8:33pm a solid dark mass shaped like a boomerang approaching the moon from the south. it was quite large and was easily seen with the naked eye.
it started at the top view as we looked at the moon from the right and it went across to the left and down infront of the moon and then changed course went up and behind the moon.
in around 10-15 seconds it reappeared back at the right side and below the moon and moved off to the left until we could not see it.
as the first object as moving out of sight a second one approached from the same right south side from the middle to lower half of the moon and moved across in a downward angle to the right.
the second dark solid boomerang object appeared to be exactly like the first one.
i had my camera on hand since i was trying to take photos of the moon since it was so bright and beautiful. 
the camera has a video mode and i have a short video of the second object moving from right to left but since the camera is not of a professional quality you can only tell the mass is solid and sort of fuzzy as it moves by.
i tried to get the first object in a video but could not focus well on the moon due to its brightness.
the event last about 2 minutes or so.
we were so excited that we did not think to go get our binoculars until after it was over.
none of my photos turned out very well. 
around the 30-35 second mark you can slightly see a dark mass moving from the right to left at the bottom of the moon.
wish i had a better video camera and was not so excited that i could hold the camera still.
content.summary: 2 boomerang shaped objects flew infront of moon with 1 object circling the moon

content.detailedDescription: I was about 4 or 5 years old. i was out in the front yard playing with a bug. i was tying a string to its leg and letting it fly around me. when i let it go, it began to fly around. as i watched it flying, i also noticed something else flying in the air. there were black looking planes a dozen or more flying in some kind of formation headed north against the backdrop of the setting sun. i didn't give them much thought, but i did realize at the time that i didn't hear any noise comming from their direction. being a kid i didn't give that much thought either. after growing tired of playing with my bug, i decided to let him go and go in the house. i continued to play in the living room until time to go to bed. while playing i decided to look out of the front window. what i saw scared me. there was the head of a person pressed against the glass. i screamed and ran over to where my mom was and told her that there was a man looking through the window. she looked out while trying to calm me down and said there was no one out there. still crying i told her yes there was. after some prodding she finally got me to look out and i didn't see anyone either. she then got me ready for bed. i was still scared bug went to bed anyway. i lay there for more than an hour before finally going to sleep only to be awakened by something pushing on the back door. so i started crying again hopeing that it would wake my mom and she would come and see about me. but that didn't happen. but what did happen i will never forget. even with my head covered i could see through the sheet a small crafg about 2 to 3 feet in diameter brightly lit. in fact it lit up the whole room. i could hear the latch on the door moving and see the door opening as the light grew brighter and brighter. i was trying to stop crying so that who ever was in the room would not hear me and perhaps go away. but instead i could see it hovering about 3 or 4 feet above my head and the lid or top was opening. i then covered my mouth and tried not to make a sound and eased the cover back just far enough to see the object and hopefully not let it see me. once the hatch was open a small person raised its head and appeared to smile at me or atleast in my direction. i was still scared and i think now that it could sense that. so the hatch closed. it went back out the same way it came in and closed and latched the door. when i finally got brave enough jumped up and went and told my mother about what had just happened and she told me that i had a bad dream. and for 50 something odd years i have been trying to convince myself thats all it was a dream. but now i'm not so sure! it seemed to real. it still seems real. except now it is real. i seem to be getting visits from some of these (for lack of a better word) creatures. when i was in my twenties i believed that i had another dream. while laying on the bed after comming home from work, i dozed off to sleep or so i thought. problem was i was paralyzed, but could still see, hear, and sense everthing around me. then the impossible happened. i was lifted from my bed and and could feel something examineing my body. touching my back one area at a time all the way to my neck and then back down again. i don't know how long i was in that position but it felt like an eternity but i believe it was only a few minutes. and then i was lowered back down on the bed and after a few minutes allowed to move again. as soon as i could get up i ran out of the house and did not go back in for several hours. these may be dreams, but now just 2 weeks ago after seeing all sorts of creatures. i wake up and my foot is bleeding and there is a small hole there that i can't explain. i have so much more to tell, but i'll save it for the investigators. but for now just know that in all of my encounters with these creatures to my knowledge i haven't been seriously harmed atleast not physically. however they do seem to like to play head games. they do also seem to know alot more about us then we will ever know about them. i also can't explain why so many of them fly over my home, hover in my front and back yard, attempt to hide behind small clouds and just observe you. i've seen alot in the last couple of years that i have been seriously observing them. the orbs seem not to be crafts but living creatures, not smooth but several textures and many types. i have seen several types of probes that leads me to believe that more than  just 1 or 2 species are studying us, but several. they appear to have the power to control gravity and not require air to live nor does it (air) seem to affect them adversly. oh and one more thing; they don't seem to exhibit any emotions, fear, expression,anger. atleast not the one that came within 5 feet of me. but allow me to qualify that statment by stating for the record, i don't know what this thing was. it didn't appear alive nor dead, it did'nt look like a probe of any kind, and it did'nt try to communicate atleast not with me.  you folks already have my number. i'll set up something with one of your investigators and we'll see what i've got. and perhaps maybe some one can shed some light on whats really going on.  thanks. for atleast trying to sort it out.
content.summary: 12 to 15 black  space craft in the western sky  i believe monoliths

content.detailedDescription:
this is my second time to report a sighting to mufon.I observed this one from the exact same location as the first. since the first sighting, i tend to keep my eyes to the sky a bit more. today, it paid off again.
 i was at work a little early, before 8:00am cst, and this morning looked to be stormy with the chance of some rain. the clouds were broken, and moving north, with about 60 to 70% broken overcast, and wind from the south about 20 mph. the clouds were very dark west of my location. approximately 8:05 i stepped outside to take a look at the weather, and noticed that commercial flights from dfw and love field were being diverted to the north/northeast around the heavy cloud bank to the west. i saw a southwest airlines plane going north east and saw an american airlines going south toward love field or dfw. both planes were around 2500 to 3000 feet agl.Both aircraft generated broken contrails due to the fairly cool air and high humidity.
 through a break in the clouds i observed a gray "cigar/cylindrical" shaped vehicle. it's path was to the north west. it had no wings,or tail surfaces, and appeared to be about 2 to 3 times longer than the southwest airlines plane. i believe the soutwest plane was a boeing 737-400.Both of the commercial airliners were moving through the broken cloud layer and the other vehicle was well above the cloud deck, and i estimate it was at 5000 feet agl.It didn't create any contrail at all.
 from my vantage point, the southwest airplane looked to be about 3/4" long and it's bright orange paint was highly visible. the vehicle i saw looked very similar to the shape of a stretched medicine capsule. long and thin, and my angle of view was from from its left rear and below.It had no lighting of any kind. no landing lights, marker lights, or anti collision strobe.
 i actually had a digital camera on hand, but as luck would have it, the batteries were dead. i had spare batteries, but i didn't manage to change them quickly enough to get any photos before this machine was obscured by clouds. everything occurred in a matter of 3 to 4 minutes.
 i was ecstatic to see something like this again, but when i realized my camera batteries were dead,it was a very quick emotional letdown to say the least. maybe the third time will be the charm for me
content.summary: Long, gray, cigar/cylindrical shape. no wings,tail,or rudder.

content.detailedDescription: I have a game camera set up on a tree out in my field. i use this to watch the deer that are feeding in my field.Every couple of days or three sometime, i retrieve my memory card and bring it in to view on my camera.On the 15 th of sept. 2010 at 7:13 p.M. my game camera took a picture of two deer feeding near my camera. it is set up to take one picture every 5 minutes once the laser beam is broken. at 7:20 p.M it took another picture. this time though to can see two sphere like objects above my treeline. i am only reporting now because i delayed thinking people thought i was nuts. approximately two years ago both my wife and i saw a ufo while we were sitting in our swimming pool one night. this was in the same area as the two. i do have pictures and would like someone to look at them. thanks
content.summary: Picture taken on my game camera

content.detailedDescription:
Description: *(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg).
 this morning i checked the above link to see what satellites would be visible over edmonton. it indicated nothing for today. at about 5:30 am i went outside to have a cigarette and coffee. at 5:35 i observed a bright light orbiting north to south and as it passed overhead the illumination went off. i thought it had passed over a cloud. about 15 seconds later the lights came on again and it continued south for about 5 seconds. i am thinking that this is a satellite. then it stopped and hovered for about 10 seconds. that immediately freaked me out. it moved north again without turning around. it just reversed direction. it stopped just south of the sherwood park freeway over 34 st. it stayed there for about 1 minute while i watched it. i am now curious about what can fly like that. it sort of danced around in a circle formed by short straight lines and came to rest where it first hovered. then it started moving west, stopped and then flew east, reversed and stopped in the same spot where it hovered for about 1 minute. it is now sinking in as to what this thing is. i just about **** my pants, because i know this thing is watching me. i ran into the office building and started recounting what i just saw. a few minutes later i checked outside and it was gone. i now know for sure that ufo\'s exist.
content.summary: Bright light dancing in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We had just finished eating a late dinner and were sitting at the picnic table outside of our camper. we had attended a penn state football game that afternoon and were spending the night at their campground which was located near the agriculture compounds. i had been looking at the night shy and then i noticed what i thought, at first, was a roman candle. after looking at it for a second i realized several things: 1. it was not falling,it was soaring. 2. it was much larger than any roman candle. 3. it was a "orange-yellow" flame that was smaller at the front than the rear. the object continued to float noiselessly over the campground at a low altitude. when it had gone for about a minute it turned to the right at a sharp angle and started to gain altitude and speed. it took several minutes for it to slowly disappear. 

shortly after it turned a neighboring camper came running over asking if we had seen it. he then went back and another member of his party took the attached picture using his blackberry. i do not know if the "v" shape it actual, or if it is a result if hand movement. it did not have a shape like this to the naked eye.
content.summary: Fireball flew over campground, then turned right and gained altitude

content.detailedDescription:
For a few weeks now, usually on tuesdays and wednesdays (trash night) my family and neighbors have seen these very bright orange and red and sometimes white lights. sometimes they will come in groups of 2 or 3, one at a time, 3-8 minutes apart. they are completely silent, which leads me to believe its not a typical aircraft. also they move in unusual patterns; typically, they'll come straight up, then travel straight, and either move farther away and disapear or move left or right and then slowly disapear. it looks like they can make paths and turns at swift 90 degree angles, and other patterns and movements that normal aircrafts cant perform. 

the first time i seen these lights i was at trenton, mi fireworks (around july 5th), they were on the detroit river, and during the fireworks myself and friends, along with the people surrounding us, witnessed these lights travel by right above us, we almost thought it was a hot air balloon, but then realized they dont go that high, or that far. we all were very curious and had no clue what the lights were, but i didnt think much of it at the time. then, a few weeks later, my dad seen the lights while taking out the trash, the same ones i had seen in trenton. this time i was kind of freaked out, i can't think of anything logical to describe what these lights could really be. they have now become almost a weekly phenomena. from where i am, in lincoln park, mi, the lights appear to be coming up from around taylor or romulous, mi, but could be further away. from where i stand in my backyard, (where i can most clearly see the lights) if i could cover the round-to-triangle shaped lights with an object, they would probably be skittle sized or aspirin sized. 

tonights lights were suprisingly very bright, a deep firey red while last weeks were more of a firey orange. tonight was also sort of cloudy, but the lights were still very visible. we questioned reporting the lights to the police, but my family and i feel it won't be investigated or taken as serious as it should be. 

basically, these lights appear almost weekly it seems, typically between 9:30 and 11:30, sometimes come in groups or periodicly every few minutes, they have strange flight patterns and are completely silent, move slowly and disapear slowly, and they are always a firey orange and red, sometimes white. 
i have no pictures or film evidence, but many have witnessed these lights in the downriver area.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange/red/white-ish lights. come in groups, odd movements. seen routinely

content.detailedDescription: Between 8 and 9 pm on september 22, 2010, i went outside and noticed a very bright red pulsating light in the southwest, about 6 to 8 inches above the horizon, which i thought could have been a planet as it was so bright (after checking with an amateur astronomer friend, it could not have been mars, which i initially thought it was). the moon is full tonight, with not many stars out and jupiter is plainly visible below and slightly to the right of the moon, as expected.  when i went outside again at 10 pm, the light had moved slightly eastward and upward at least half again its prior height above the horizon, and no longer appeared as a bright red color; it was rather white in aspect.  i ran inside for my binoculars and camera, and when i came back outside, it was moving in an east/northeast direction. the height relative to the horizon seemed to increase as it moved, likely because it was passing by my position.  when viewed through the binoculars, it was a grouping of three lights, 2 red and one white, which did not blink but remained constant.   the two red lights were forward as it moved, with the white light trailing behind. i could not make out any shape corresponding to the lights.  i am not sure whether its true altitude had changed as it passed from southwest of me to east/northeast of my position.  there were no planes in the sky, and the speed of the three lights was indeterminate, neither slow nor fast ��� there was nothing to compare it to. i tried to take pictures (sony cyber-shot 14.1 on twilight setting), however, it was not possible to see through the viewfinder; i could only point and shoot. the only one that i got is attached, but it does not clearly represent what i had seen through the binoculars.  not sure if it is related, but my dog was most eager to go outside during this time (actually, he was the reason i was out there), and since the lights moved away, he has been content to remain indoors.
content.summary: Distant bright red light; after it moved , saw it was 3 lights, two red, one white

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving west and saw some strange lights off to our left and it really puzzled us. we didn't understand at first what we were looking at and we were not able to get pictures in time. we only saw it for a minute or two. it had 3 lights and we knew it was way too big to be a plane. it was kinda swaying side to side but staying in the same general area util it was gone. just before it was gone, it acted as if it turned straight up and down, instead of horizontal..And each light dissapeared one at a time. we both wish we could see it again!
content.summary: 3 hovering lights  in a triangle shape, then disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was driving up a hill that borders one of many farms in the area. when i looked to the right  which was a valley like field with much open space i noticed a large yellow hovering light source. it appeared at first as an abnormally close star. after pulling over to observe it the object began moving slowly. it was moving from above the tree line upward then began moving horizontally and eventually was almost directly over head. as it traveled slowly overhead i got a clear look at the large orb like blinding light that was in what appeared to be the front of whatever craft it may have been. i could not see the definite shape of the object but there we two rectangular blue lights running parallel down what seemed to be the edges of the craft as well as a bright red light in the rear. as the craft moved farther away and almost out of sight due to the thickly wooded are directly behind me the red light became clearer and appeared to what i can only describe as "jet looking" although the craft was moving a little slower than a low flying plane i took full notice of the red ring on the rear that seemed to be producing pulsating heat. after it went out of sight i stood starring at the sky looking at other extremely bright stars but nothing was comparable to what i saw and the way it hovered and changed direction was unexplainable. i witnessed something first hand that fully assured me that there are aircrafts being used by  either humans or other forms of intelligence. please if anyone in this area or nearby saw something notable contact me. i ill not be at ease until i hear of other sightings on this day- (*wit's name and email address deleted--cms/sg) facebook search me please do whatever you have to if you have any form of story you would like to share
content.summary: Witnessed hovering orange light that began to change direction. later flew over me revealling bright red light in the rear and no flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I often watch sunrise,when it is not obscured by clouds. today was a particularly clear morning. i glanced out the window & saw what i first assumed was a spider web but it seemed very far off. i moved to another room to get another view, i could tell that this was very far off and likely in the stratosphere. it remained directly above the sunrise. i also thought it was a contrail. however it did not dissipate in the manner which a contrail even a "persistent" contrail have in the past. 

i observed this through a window of the second floor of my home. the screen had been removed and i was filming while physically holding my camera outside.

for the most part, it was difficult to see without looking through the camera because of the brightness of the sun. however, at around 10:00, it was visible with the naked eye. it almost seemed to project itself forward or backward in order to move but stayed at an angle. it appeared to be extremely large/long. sometimes it appeared a a row of balls and other times it appeared smooth, a couple of times, i witnessed it change to an orange/red color, which seemed to flow through the rod-like structure. video footage and digital photographs were taken on a sony handycam with 20x optical zoom, a digital  finepix camera and a cannon rebel camera with a 300mm lens.
there was one other witness to this, which was my husband, he also watched this for several minutes and does not agree that this was any of the things i initially thought it was. 

additionally, it appeared that there was a lot of "activity" around this rod-like structure but i am unsure of the nature of these quick moving objects. some did seem to be coming out of the structure. i was very overwhelmed by the whole thing and would have rather that something would happen to reveal that there was a simple benign explanation for what we were seeing and would have preferred that it would have just gone away. regardless, i could not take my eyes off of it,  until it was finally gone.
i did upload a video to you tube in the hopes of getting some ideas.
the link is [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Rod-like

content.detailedDescription: Driving east on allyn st. 8 orange balls of light traveling north .One ball in front two sets of three in a triangle pattern and a sixth following  dissapeared  one at a time in the same spot dimming out (maybe behind a cloud) .When i saw a formation of bright orange balls i stopped driving and watched for a few minutes .When they one by one dissapeared i then turned around and got on the highway there is an overpass on i95 n. overlooking the mystic river unfortunately they never came out of the clouds in any direction.They looked to me like flares but i never see orange bright balls for flares moving in a straight path and staying at the same height there are no training grounds for the military here  airplanes here are green red and white these were bright orange. there was also no noise
content.summary: 6 orange balls in formation

content.detailedDescription: I was 8.5hrs into my shift as a truck driver when i saw out of my passenger window a craft moving west, at an altitude of 300-400ft (there was a storm with low cloud cover but not raining yet) down the 401 on september 22, 2010 at 1:10am. i was driving down pinebush rd after leaving my employers office. about 400ft to the right i caught out of the corner of my eye, what i thought was a helicopter with it being so low and all the big lights. there were three large bright lights 60ft apart in the shape of a triangle, with two lights about half the size/brightness in the center as well as a small red flashing light just like the ones seen on civilian aircraft. the lights seemed to create (atleast from my angle) a gold/orange haze obscuring the shape of the object. it was moving forward with the flat part of the triangle, leaving the point at the rear. turning a short distance before franklin blvd the craft pivoted the right light toward hespler, while tilting alittle in a tight 90 degree turn. the craft was now moving with the pointed part of the triangle over food basics and then over the houses vanishing out of sight. i couldn't hear anything but then again i was driving a loud big rig. i slowed my driving so i could watch it more and was amazed at how much ground it covered without appearing to be moving fast. i was excited to see this object but didn't feel the enlightening/awakening i had felt with my sighting in 1999 of a green orb. i felt up beat and good about the sighting until i got home at 4:00am, i then started to feel a little down and discouraged. i keep thinking what i saw was normal and not "out of my reality" and there for is not a big deal. then i would change my mind and think it was important and would want to find out what it was. i think i'm feeling this was because it wasn't as crazy as the green orb but either way i thought i'd let everyone know what i saw and who knows if more people come out with sightings.
content.summary: 3 lights at each point, 2 smaller lights in the center with a smaller red blinking light. between the lights there was a golden haze obscuring the object.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home after a doctor's appointment in town in the early afternoon in the summer of 1984. i lived in southwestern michigan at the time. i first saw the flying object soon after i turned on a road which led four miles to my home. it was a beautiful sunny day without hardly a cloud in the sky. i saw a reflection in the corner of my left eye. i looked up at the tree line as i was traveling 45 mph. i was stunned to see a cigar shaped object reflecting rays from the sun. i could plainly distinguish a beautiful mirror like surface. i saw no wings,no port holes, no fins, no rudders,and no seams. it appeared to be one solid flying object. i became fearful and speeded my car up to 55 mph and then 60, 65, 70, 75, 80, and last 85 mph. the craft accelerated each time i did, which caused sheer panic to sweep over me! i had to slow down shortly after reaching 85 mph since my house was in view. the craft slowed down and stopped across the street at the tree line. i blew my horn and the baby sitter (16 years old neighbor girl) and my three children and nephew ran out of the house to witness the craft accelerating up and down at the tree line and just across the road only a few feet from our home. out home was close to the main road, and the craft hovered just across the street. as we stood gazing in awe the noiseless craft turned and began to slowly move northwest. i will never forget the lady that looked straight up as she drove her car past our home. she was fixated on the strange craft and i feared she would run into a tree. i was astounded at what we had witnessed that sunny afternoon. it is forever etched in my memory. the craft was unlike anything i have ever seen in this world. i have no idea what it was.
content.summary: Mirror like surface. closely shaped like a cigar. no port holes, no fins, rudders, or seams. approximately 40 feet long.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping and i felf like somethig shook me awake, my wife christie remained sleeping. i went to check my kids and they were sleeping as well and i noticed the house was quiet- no sound at all. then it was like someone flipped a switch and flood lights filled the house- that was what i initially thought. then i noticed that each window regardless of orientation had light coming in- so bright in fact that you could not see out. i went to my room and my wife was awake standing the middle of the room and looked at me, although she claims to have never been awake. i glimpsed what i thought was one of my kids in the mirror, they were both in bed though, then my next recolection was lying in bed next to my wife waking up with thte lights still coming in. i realized i was able to move and i thought i saw my kids run down the stairs..As i ran to catch them i noticed my kids were in their beds- i was spooked bad..Then the lights disapated enough for me to see that a ligjht source was above my bed, when i looked out and up i noticed a disk like object shooting straight up. my kids claim no recolection but my wife has similar memories to mine.
content.summary: House lit up through all windows-bright white light- none on street claims to have seen

content.detailedDescription:
I was up working on a buisness plan when i decided to get some water on my return to the room i observed what was a red star like object out the window i got up open up the curtain to get a better look. since in the past 9 days i had 2 sightings and i had a hunch it could be the same object.

as i started at it to confirm if it was it, it stayed stationary for another 20 seconds or so then it shift to the left just enough to notice it moved and then remained stable for like 10 seconds suddenly it got bright red and lite up like those signs in las vegas, then it dimmed and faded for like 10 seconds, then it light up again but back to the initial way i 1st seen it, and then started heading southbound as it moved it was lighting up red and then visible ligths around it gave it an impressing to be a round but saucer shape object. it headed south and i thought i was recording to find out the batteries were dead, although i did manage to snap several pictures along with a :45 second video...
content.summary: Star light object liminated red

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were driving home from the store around 9:30pm. we were driving through town, through the intersections, when my friend joking said "hey look, a ufo!" while pointing at what looked like a plane in the sky. my response was "no, shut up. it's just a plane."  then we argued about it's shape and size and lights. until i was mostly convinced that it wasn't a plane.

it was in a triangle formation. most planes have the two flashing lights on their wings. this had three white lights at its tips and a red light in the center.  it was moving very slowly and silently and was also very low down. we watched as it flew over us until traffic moved forward and it went away from view.
content.summary: Black triangle with lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Third observation. friends have seen before, and have photos and will send separately. blinking red, white, green and blue lights, appears to rotate. colors appear to change location. hovering for a long time, with slight southward track. appeared tonight at approx. 90 degrees east to slightly south of east of 08816- distance appx. 20-30 miles at appx. 30 degrees above horizon. maybe even as far away as ny harbor. other sightings closer to east brunswick, nj. another similarly lighted object sighted lower and further south of object 1, but lower to horizon, further away (apparently) and too close to trees and building to differentiate more.

other reports to follow from others who have made repeated sightings. i have not seen object, just lights. others have seen object and have described it as whitish oval, perhaps skewed/with upward or downward angle.
content.summary: Blinking white, red, green and blue lights. appears to rotate. stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
About 6:35pm while driving on rt 95 s/128s in burlington,ma, on sept 21 2010.I saw what i first thought was a contrail with a steep incline, or a strange white cloud. have no idea of distance. it was not breaking up ,stayed the same size and same location.
was able to take 3 photos on  iphone. then i saw the middle of this thing vanish. now there were 2 objects.I saw a quick flash of light from the end of one object, seemed white, only one flash. with the naked eye it looked like a cloud, no structure to it. at this point it was out of my sight. it was west of my location, the moon was on my left object on my right.
upon zooming in on the photos you could see yellow round things surounding the cigar shaped object, this was before it broke into two parts. they apeared to be attached to the object. the sighting lasted about 3 minutes.
content.summary: Saw  white cigar shaped object. it split in two. saw light flash on one

content.detailedDescription: Ufo white circle orb prob. was above my home in the sky of panorama city ca. i have photos for mufonla.
content.summary: Ufo white circle orb prob. was above my home in the sky of panorama city ca. i have photos for mufonla.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo white circle orb prob. was above my home in the sky of panorama city ca. i have photos for mufonla.
content.summary: Ufo white circle orb prob.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was messing with the vid cammera and noticed these on the veiw screen (we didnt see anything )so when we got home we down loaded them. i dont knoww what they are but they look like ufos to me.
content.summary: My daughter snaped these by accident

content.detailedDescription:
My husband noticed the bright 'star' at about 5:50 a.M. in a westerly direction from our bedroom. after deciding it couldn't be a helicopter, airplane or blimp i decided to take notice. i was suprised to see that what he was looking at was the same thing i had noticed the night before. it was the same bright lights in a southerly direction from our bedroom the night before but quickly dismissed since i had had a sighting a few months ago. i didn't want to know. however, this time i couldn't resist watching in an attempt to 'figure it out'. i began to watch the triangular shaped object with one very prominent light that turned red, then back to white. the object hovered in the same location above the tree line then took off in a slow but purposeful southerly direction where it hovered and moved back and forth for about twenty minutes (above and between two trees) before slowly moving away in the distance at 6:31 a.M. most notable was the appearance of the object. a couple times i noticed what appeared to be a fog or smoke surrounding the object with long trails of lights much like tentacles. the most prominent light was very bright fading in and out. there were lights around the primary light which gave me the opinion it had to be triangle in shape. 
i watched with disappointment as the object moved away from me in a westward direction. it finally disappeared behind the trees at 6:31 a.M. as it began to get light out. i was disappointed to see it leave. i want to know more.
content.summary: Triangular shaped brite lights hovering in sky. smoke or fog with light trails.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter, son-in-law, and i were at an overlook area near downtown kansas city, missouri. we were watching fireworks around the area and across the river into kansas city, kansas.
one of us happened to look up and saw a light coming in our direction at about 20 thousand feet(estimate). we started watching it and noticed that it had a steady whitish light. it came overhead and turned going back in the direction from where we say it first. kind of a semi circle. when it was over head we heard no noise as we would have heard with a commercial plane. i took a picture with my phone, but it looks like a bright white dot. there were no flashing tail or wing lights, just the steady whitish light. there were other people there that started watching it also and they all said that it couldn't have been an airplane.
we watched it until it went out of sight. i would have sent this earlier but just found out about your website.
i have looked on the internet for anyone else who saw this but no luck.
content.summary: Steady light passing overhead with no noise

content.detailedDescription: We were on are way to a family dinner around 5: 35- we traveled by car on the main road through the borough of conchohocken which is out side of philadelphia. usually when i am in the car and not driving i tend to look at houses and scenery on the way. this time, however, i felt the need to stare out at the sky. it was just as the sun was over the horizen and getting ready to set. i was wearing my high definition perscription sunglasses at the time, so i could look close to the sun with out having to look away.  if i had not worn these glasses i could not have stared directly next to the sun for th 10 minutes this event went on. when i first looked up at the sky i noticed an unusal vapor trail. i kept starring at it and assumed it was a plane.  i kept staring at it and it was moving too slow to be a plane.  there were two commerical aircraft in that area that did not emit a vapor tail and they were moving much faster. this area also has many traffic helicopters that i see all the time over i76 - these helicopters do not emit a vapor trail and usually can be seen since they fly fairly low.  i noticed the vapor trail was shaped similar to that of a comet- it was white and rectagular and looked like it could be a cloud but it was too low to be a cloud- there were several cloud formations above but they did not move as this vapor cloud was moving slowly and keeping up with the car.  i noticed the sun glare on an metallic object at the front of the vapor trail- it was a very small silver metalic sphere or circle. i assumed it was a nose of a plane. i kept looking at the object for several minutes due to i could not fiqure out how a plane could move so slow and it was too small to be a traffic helicopter.  i then turned away and looked back and saw a small metallic silver sphere in the sky not moving just there montionless with out the vapor trail- it then dissapeared. it was right next to the sun so most people with out protective wear could not propably see it- i then began to consider all the possibilities of what it could be and did not come up with any solution- we do have a small national guard base in plymouth meeting and also an army reserve center in the area which does have tanks.  i do belive in ufo's and study the documentation but never actually had an experience- i am a rational person and would not have reported this unless i could come up with no other explanation.  i do believe ufo's are investigating military bases. i would be happy to testify to this if needed.  it is time for disclosure.  thank you for the opportunity for me to do my part bu telling you my small story. [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Tiny silver metallic ball in sky next to sun- had a vapor trail which was unusual and then trail disappeared and ball was alone in sky then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out of my house to have my nightly look at the stars. i was facing to the east from north manchester. i noticed a bright star or some planets bundled together( i think it may have been uranus and jupiter) to the south east. it was left of the moon. while watching that bright star. a light came on to the left of the star/planets. it came on for about 4 seconds and was orange and then faded off. it reminded me of the older car lights..Orange colored and slowly fade off. i know it wasnt a plane because it never moved.(yes i know sometimes they turn there landing lights on for a bit and if they are headed straight at you ..It may look like its staying in place)after the light faded out there was a black spot in its place. i could see a round black spot because the moon was so bright and i saw it with my binoculars. the black spot stayed in position for a half an hour. i looked down for a second and looked back up and it was gone. i missed seeing the orange light with the binoculars.. when i went to reach for them the light went out.
content.summary: Orange ball of light fading away

content.detailedDescription:
I put together a youtube video explaining my 911 call and showing my drawings, map and videos of the third day we see a ufo near stockdale, texas. this is the link [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
i need more witness to come forward so i can narrow down the crash site of the first event.
content.summary: Update to texas sightings

content.detailedDescription: I was outside talking with a friend of mine. she was distracted by a strange light in the sky coming from the north going south. it appeard to be a red light with a trail of light which give it the effect of a rocket. it wasnt moving fast from our ponit but with the light trail it had that effect. then the trail of light vanished and all you can see was a red light in the sky. we took a good look at it to see if it was a plane. i wasnt able to see any blinking strobe lights on the object. it was just a red light. i was still heading south bound when we notice what appear to be a white glow of a light that covered the front of the light about 180 degrees. we figured it was just a plan with the head lights but the light then was completely around the red ball. then the red ball vanished in the blink of a eye.
content.summary: Looked like a rocket at first then a red light then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
Outside walking dogs when noticed two oval shaped objects, one larger than the other, both had green and red lights spinning artound the under part of crafts. they over a mountain called doublehead, near black mountain in jackson, n.H. every once in a while the larger one would send a beam of red light to the smaller one and the smaller one would then return a beam of red light! they stayed in one spot while this was happening. don't know how long this lasted...Seemed like a very long time. fear made me go back into house.
about a year ago the sky in the same location was completly lit up with the same kind of action.
the night skies are very active in this area every august, september and october!
content.summary: Two oval shaped objects beaming lights at each other
